doc.title: 224 First Avenue
doc.plot: A lot is going on at 224 First Avenue. Three horny guys, a deck of card and what you get is a strip poker game which ends up involving the pizza delivery boy as well. Soon though, Breck Stewart leaves the party to join his latest paramour Stephen Pike in the backyard for some steamy lovemaking in black and white. In the meantime, Blake Anthony and Sebastian regain their color and start their love tryst with a sensual shower scene.

A lot is going on at 224 First Avenue. Three horny guys, a deck of card and what you get is a strip poker game which ends up involving the pizza delivery boy as well. Soon though, Breck Stewart leaves the party to join his latest paramour Stephen Pike in the backyard for some steamy lovemaking in black and white. In the meantime, Blake Anthony and Sebastian regain their color and start their love tryst with a sensual shower scene.
